version_description:
The time is now (and then!) in Modern Day, Part 2. Battle zombies from past and present in 16 new levels, and experience an epic encounter with Dr. Zomboss that will take you back to where it all began. The update includes:

• 2 classic zombies, All-Star Zombie and Super-Fan Imp
• 3 new plants, including the explosive Escape Root
• An incredible time-traveling taco hunt
• Plus, a Zomboss battle royale that will echo through the ages

Thanks for playing! Remember to rate us after each update.

The Springening is in bloom, March 22 through April 4. Spring into action in this latest update, including:

• 9 freshly-hatched zombies
• The return of Dandelion, the explosive special-edition plant
• New collectible plant costumes
• Piñata Party’s egg-cellent Eggbreaker mode, back for another crack
• Plus, Epic Quests – complete a series of challenges to earn rewards like gems or exclusive plant Gold Bloom

Thanks for playing! Please be sure to rate us after playing each update.

Grab your Birthdayz hat – Plants vs. Zombies is turning 7! Celebrate with 10 days of Piñata Party surprises, May 3 – 12. The full update includes:

• 8 zombies, decked out in their Birthdayz best
• 5 limited-time collectible plant costumes, sure to get the party started
• Guaranteed Gems with every win

Thanks for playing! Please be sure to tell us what you think of the game by rating us after each update.

The distant past meets Far Future in 11 days of Piñata Party mayhem! Weed through tangled timelines, May 26 – June 5. The full update includes:

Zesty new special-edition plant, Wasabi Whip, complete with fire dancing action
3 limited-time collectible plant costumes
More Vasebreaker and Beghouled mini-games to unearth in daily parties

We’ve also made some behind-the-scenes adjustments to keep your zombies shambling smoothly on newer devices. Thanks for playing!

The distant past meets Far Future in 11 days of Piñata Party mayhem! Weed through tangled timelines, May 26 – June 5. The full update includes:

• Zesty new special-edition plant, Wasabi Whip, complete with fire dancing action
• 3 limited-time collectible plant costumes
• More Vasebreaker and Beghouled mini-games to unearth in daily parties

We’ve also made some behind-the-scenes adjustments to keep your zombies shambling smoothly on newer devices. Thanks for playing!

The distant past meets Far Future in 11 days of Piñata Party mayhem! Weed through tangled timelines, May 26 – June 5. The full update includes:

• Zesty new special-edition plant, Wasabi Whip, complete with fire dancing action
• 3 limited-time collectible plant costumes
• More Vasebreaker and Beghouled mini-games to unearth in daily parties

We’ve also made some behind-the-scenes adjustments to keep your zombies shambling smoothly on newer devices. Thanks for playing!

Summer Nights are here and the un-living is easy. Celebrate with hot backyard parties June 23 through July 7, plus:

• Special-edition plant Strawburst – jamming for a limited time
• New special-edition plant Explode-O-Nut
• 7 summer-ready zombies, including Hot Dog Imp
• Explosive firework piñatas
• 5 collectible costumes
• Summertime Vasebreaker mode – sparklers with every smash

Thanks for playing! Be sure to rate us after each update.

Swing into summer with the latest Plants vs. Zombies 2 update! From July 28 to August 10 enjoy:

• New special-edition plant Kiwibeast
• Two weeks of Beghouled Beyond mini-games in daily parties
• New Epic Quest – complete a series of challenges to earn fresh exclusive plant Aloe Thanks for playing!

Please be sure to rate us after each update.

Get awesome for autumn with our latest update! From August 30 to September 27, enjoy:

• Chicken Week – get clucky and win big
• Football Week – plant like a champion
• Small zombies and big prizes in Imp Week
• Unvault Week – play 3 unvaulted premium plants: Sapfling, Blooming Heart, and Dandelion
• Plus, an explosive new premium plant: Bombegranate

Thanks for playing! Be sure to rate us after each update.

Get ready for a rich and riveting PvZ 2 fall harvest with plantiful updates, including:

• The bizarre Big Brainz event – huge-headed ghouls encroach, September 29 to October 12
• Keysplosion – for the first time ever, all worlds can be unlocked and explored
• Bigger challenges and higher stakes with worlds in a new order
• All-new and stunningly powerful premium plant, Apple Mortar

Thanks for playing! Be sure to rate us after each update.

Visions and apparitions come out to play in the Lawn of Doom event, Oct. 18 – Nov. 1! This update includes:
• Witch Hazel, the enchanting all-new premium plant
• Ghost Pepper, emerging from the crypt for a limited time
• Jack O' Lantern, making a scorching return
• The Lawn of Doom Zombie Players, rocking all manner of spooktacular costumes
Plus, win fun Halloween costumes for your plants Thanks for playing, boys and ghouls! Be sure to rate us after each update.

Ravenous zombies are cooking up a mouthwateringly good time in our Food Fight event, from Nov 15 to Dec 1! This update includes:

• Parsnip, the happy, snappy, all-new premium plant
• Sweet Potato, back for a tasty return
• Sneaky zombies dressed up as waiters, chefs, diners, and delicious dishes
• Plus, fun new costumes for your plants

Thanks for playing, plant fans! Be sure to rate us after each update.

It’s the most Feastivus time of the year! Celebrate Dec 13 – Jan 2 with our latest update, including:

• Missile Toe, the icy and spicy premium plant
• Sapfling, branching out of the vault and better than ever
• New scheduled quests with more rewards and prizes
• Brightly decorated lawns, and zombies in festive holiday gear
• Special holiday prizes from Señor Piñata
• Plus, collectible costumes for your plants

Thanks for playing! Be sure to rate us after each update.

Grow your arsenal and enhance your plants with the Power Plants update, starting January 10! Now you can:

• Earn Seed Packets to develop powerful plants like never before, with amplified attacks, bolstered defenses, unique abilities, and more
• Find fun piñatas stuffed with Seed Packets and other goodies in new Scheduled Quests
• Score more plants, costumes, and bundles – on sale in the Store

Thanks for playing! Be sure to rate us after each update.

Hey, lawn defenders! In this update, you can enhance your attacks and abilities with Power Plants – earn Seed Packets to level up plants as you play! Then, get gussied up for Valenbrainz, Feb. 7 – 16. Plus:

• New Ancient Egypt and Modern Day levels, including recently unearthed zombies
• A fresh plant: the enticing and irresistible Hot Date
• Doting zombies in delightful Valenbrainz garb
• Loads of fun piñatas stuffed with Seed Packets and more in new Scheduled Quests

Thanks for playing!

It’s luckiness and liveliness in this latest update, with two events: Luck o’ the Zombie, March 13–23, and the Springening, April 4 – 18. Get ready for:

• Exciting new levels with extra-hungry zombies
• More ways to earn piñatas and grow your plants
• Caulipower, the mesmerizing all-new premium plant
• Zombies dressed in all sorts of silly costumes
• Additional Epic Quests for fabulous rewards

Thanks for playing, PvZ 2 enthusiasts! Be sure to rate us after each update.

Plants vs. Zombies is 8 years old! Celebrate in the latest update with the Birthdayz event, May 2 – 11, which includes:

•Birthdayz presents bursting with gems
•Tough new levels with tricky zombies
•Exciting opportunities to level-up particular plants
•Fresh Epic Quests with delightful rewards

Thanks for 8 great years, PvZ fans, and may there be many more! Please be sure to rate us after each update.

Get balmy and relaxed —though also agile and alert— with our Summer Nights event, June 27 through July 7! The update includes:

•Electric Peashooter, the courageously charged premium plant
•Voracious new Jurassic Marsh zombies and humblingly hard levels
•Extra coin awards throughout Summer Nights
•Zombies adorned in silly summer outfits
•Quests, quests, quests, including Premium Plant Epic Quests, Leveled-up Plant Quests, and fresh quests with craaazy objectives

Thanks for playing, soil survivors! Be sure to rate us after each update.

Hey, PvZ 2 fans! A host of special events and more are shambling your way, including:

•Plant-swapping goodness in Beghouled Beyond, Jul 31 – Aug 6
•Time Twister, featuring spicy Wasabi Whip, Aug 14 – 23
•Giant swollen heads in Big Brainz, Aug 24 – Sep 4
•More rootin’-tootin’ Wild West zombies in extra-tricky levels
•Plus, all-new Premium Plant Epic Quests, Leveled-up Plant Quests, and Wild West Epic Quests

Thanks for playing!

Protect your brains in a host of new quests and events! The update includes:

· Fresh premium plant and illumination sensation, Solar Tomato
· New Inzanity Quests with a fresh crop of organically-grown levels each day
· Mega-meloned zombies in the Big Brainz event, Aug 29 – Sep 4
· Loads of precious seed packets in Premium Plant Epic Quests
· More Epic Quests, including the Boosted Zombie Bonanza
· The debut of tough-skinned Security Gourd

Thanks for playing!

Get haunted and hungry in new Lawn of Doom and Food Fight events! This update includes:

· Lawn of Doom, Oct. 17 – Nov. 2, with spooky spirits and chomping chills
· Food Fight, Nov. 14 – 30, with brainy feasts and tasty costumes
· Fan-favorites Ghost Pepper, Jack O’ Lantern, and Sweet Potato – unvaulted for a limited time
· Big seed packet payouts in Premium Plant Epic Quests
· Even more Inzanity Quests with rewards galore

Thanks for playing!

Bundle up for the Feastivus holiday event, December 5 – January 2! You’ll find tons of frostbitten fun, like:

· A Very Yeti Feastivus super quest event
· Holly Barrier, the all-new protective premium plant
· Two premium plant unvaults: sticky Sap-fling and merry Missile Toe
·Jolly new Premium Epic Quests and Inzanity Quests bursting with seed packets

Stay cool, PvZ 2 fans! Be sure to rate us after each update.

Battlez is here! Get ready for brand-new ways to play in our biggest update since launch. Now you can:

· Compete against other players to climb the leaderboard
· Battle relentless waves of zombies to get high scores
· Earn coins, piñatas, gauntlets, and other astounding league rewards
· Put your leveled-up Power Plants and zombie-bashing skills to the ultimate test
· Play all-new Daily Activities in the Travel Log

Thanks for playing!

Get ready for all-new Power Mints! These special plants give great big boosts to plants in their family. Earn Mints through Battlez to upgrade your Power Mints. Start by powering up your electric plants with Fila-mint – the first Power Mint to be released.

Plus, beat the heat with custom levels in Summer Nights, June 26 – July 7, and don’t miss even more Epic Quests, Battlez Tournaments, and Piñata Parties. Thanks for your support!

Guard your gardens for a lawn full of summer fun! This update includes freshly grown plants, an abundance of events, and more. Enjoy:

•A farm-fresh basket of brand-new Power Mints with fancy added effects
•More Piñata Parties, Epic Quests, and Tournaments
•Behind-the-scenes improvements to your game

Thanks for playing! Be sure to rate us after each update.

Hey, botanical battlers! It’s harvest time – get ready for a heap o’ fall features, like:

•Buffz & Bruisez that allow specific plant families to be stronger, weaker, or ineffective against zombies
•Battlez Practice Quest, an all-new preview and testing ground for Battlez Tournaments
•Sneaky new zombie countermeasures that pop up when you least expect
•Fresh Power Mints to boost your plants
•More dazzling Piñata Parties, Epic Quests, and Tournaments

Thanks for playing!

Winter approaches with a flurry of features! Now you can:

•Get two new Premium Plants, like Sling Pea
•Play events like Food Fight (Nov.) and Feastivus (Dec.)
•Push plants past the level cap with Plant Mastery levels
•Get fresh Power Mints to boost plants
•Select favorite plants in the Seed Chooser, making picking plants a breeze
•Register your e-mail to back up your game progress and play on multiple devices
•Play new Piñata Parties, Battlez Tournaments, and Epic Quests 

Thanks for playing!

Winter approaches with a flurry of features! Now you can:

•Get two new Premium Plants, like Sling Pea
•Play events like Food Fight (Nov.) and Feastivus (Dec.)
•Push plants past the level cap with Plant Mastery levels
•Get fresh Power Mints to boost plants
•Select favorite plants in the Seed Chooser, making picking plants a breeze
•Register your e-mail to back up your game progress and play on multiple devices
•Play new Piñata Parties, Battlez Tournaments, and Epic Quests 

Thanks for playing!

Buckle up for a sensational new year of PvZ 2! Night recedes, days get longer, and fun features abound, including:

•The love-bitten Valenbrainz event, February 6 – 15
•Upcoming Premium Plant, the insatiable Snap Pea
•New Power Mints and Battlez levels
•More Piñata Parties, Tournaments, and Epic Quests

PvZ 2 is getting updated as the battle for brains continues unabated! Highlights from this update include:

•Two sensational events: Luck O’ the Zombie in March and The Springening in April
•New Power Mints
•More Piñata Parties, Battlez Tournaments, and Epic Quests
•The ability to save your game across multiple platforms by linking your email
•Fixes to enhance your experience

Thanks for playing! Be sure to rate us after each update.

Celebrate Plants vs. Zombie’s 10-year anniversary with PvZ2! The eternal struggle between plants and zombies is growing, and now includes:

• Battlez Seasons, a new feature with wild prizes to reward great play an anniversarial Birthdayz event
• Two fresh Premium Plants – don’t miss the remarkable ZoyBean Pod
• More pulse-pounding Piñata Parties, Battlez Tournaments, and Epic Quests

Don’t get caught with your plants down! And, cause it’s loads of fun, please rate us after each update.

Hey zombie battlers! You can soak up some sun in our latest update, with:

• More Battlez Seasons with exclusive Season Prizes
• The timely Summer Nights event from 6/25 – 7/5, with fun outfits and fancy awards
• Two new plants: Enlighten-mint and the shocking Electrici-tea
• Piñata Parties, Battlez Tournaments, and Epic Quests
• Plus behind-the-lawn tweaks and improvements

Grow plants, defeat zombies! It’s a circle of life – and then some!

Hey zombie battlers! You can soak up some sun in our latest update, with:

• More Battlez Seasons with exclusive Season Prizes
• The timely Summer Nights event from 6/25 – 7/5, with fun outfits and fancy awards
• Two new plants: Enlighten-mint and the shocking Electrici-tea
• Piñata Parties, Battlez Tournaments, and Epic Quests
• Plus behind-the-lawn tweaks and improvements

Grow plants, defeat zombies! It’s a circle of life – and then some!

Look lively, PvZ2 fans! Botanic diversity abounds in our latest update, with:
• More Seasons with exclusive Prizes
• New Plant Type: space-saving Vines, introduced with the bombastic Blastberry Vine
• Plus two more new plants coming soon!
• Pinata Parties, Tournaments and Epic Quests
• Plus bushels of bug fixes and back-end game improvements
Don’t get caught with your plants down! And, cause it’s loads of fun, please rate us after each update.

Apply your attention, PvZ 2 enthusiasts! Fruitful thrills are on their way in our latest update, with:
•More Arena Seasons with tons of Season Prizes
•A favorite plant of yore gets a startling upgrade – log in to find out which one
•Pinata Parties, Arena Tournaments, and Epic Quests
•Baskets of behind-the-scenes fixes and improvements
Thanks for playing!

Get spooky with our Halloween-iest update ever! It includes:
• Alarming Arena Seasons with all-new Season Prizes
• The startling Lawn of Doom Event from 10/16 – 11/1
• An un-vaulting of classic and un-creepy Lawn of Doom plants
• Shocking Pinata Parties and Epic Quests
• Eerie fixes and chillingly awesome quality-of-life improvements
Don’t be too scared – but do have a lot of spine-chilling fun! Thanks, too, for playing!

Get spooky with our Halloween-iest update ever! It includes:
• Alarming Arena Seasons with all-new Season Prizes
• The startling Lawn of Doom Event from 10/16 – 11/1
• An un-vaulting of classic and un-creepy Lawn of Doom plants
• Shocking Pinata Parties and Epic Quests
• Eerie fixes and chillingly awesome quality-of-life improvements
Don’t be too scared – but do have a lot of spine-chilling fun! Thanks, too, for playing!

Hey zombie zappers! Winter’s on its way, and with it a bracing PvZ2 update, including:
* Joyful Arena Seasons with all-new Season Prizes
* The perennial favorite Feastivus holiday event blooming from 12/11 – 1/2
* Exciting new plants – don’t miss frosty Ice Bloom’s chill thrills
* Jolly Pinata Parties and merry Epic Quests, sparkling like fresh-fallen snow

We’ve made some behind-the-lawn updates, too. The days may be getting shorter, but PvZ2 keeps getting bigger!

Shuffle vigorously into the New Year with an exciting PvZ 2 update, including:

•All-new Penny’s Pursuit mode – play levels and battle Dr. Zomboss for rewards
•Roman zombies making their game debut, arising from ancient history with surprises in store
•Cool new plants, including the sharpshooting Dartichoke
•Refreshing Pinata Parties and challenging Epic Quests
•Fixes and improvements

Thanks for playing!

Shuffle vigorously into the New Year with an exciting PvZ 2 update, including:

•All-new Penny’s Pursuit mode – play levels and battle Dr. Zomboss for rewards
•Roman zombies making their game debut, arising from ancient history with surprises in store
•Cool new plants, including the sharpshooting Dartichoke
•Refreshing Pinata Parties and challenging Epic Quests
•Fixes and improvements

Thanks for playing!

As winter thaws, prepare for new growth in this exciting PvZ 2 update! It includes:

•New levels, perks, and rewards in Penny’s Pursuit mode
•Fresh, fun plants, including the illuminating Shine Vine
•An intimidating threat: The ballista-like Zcorpion Zombie
•Challenging Piñata Parties and Epic Quests
•Behind-the-scenes fixes to keep your game crisp

Thanks for playing!

Get blooming with an exciting spring PvZ 2 update! It includes:

•Fun new plants, including the knockabout Tumbleweed
•More rambunctious Roman Zombies: Medusa and the flavorful Caesar
•New levels, perks, and rewards for Penny's Pursuit mode
•Challenging Pinata Parties and lively Epic Quests
•Plus, a heaping helping of handy improvements

Thanks for playing Plants vs. Zombies 2!

Get blooming with an exciting spring PvZ 2 update! It includes:

•Fun new plants, including the knockabout Tumbleweed
•More rambunctious Roman Zombies: Medusa and the flavorful Caesar
•New levels, perks, and rewards for Penny's Pursuit mode
•Challenging Pinata Parties and lively Epic Quests
•Plus, a heaping helping of handy improvements

Thanks for playing Plants vs. Zombies 2!

Bask in the glorious summer rays of a new PvZ 2 update! It includes:
• Radical new plants, including the oily Olive Pit
• New perks, levels, and rewards in the Darker Ages World for Penny’s Pursuit Mode
• More Season events and prizes
• Elaborate Epic Quests and Pinata parties
• Summer Nights event featuring the return of Strawburst and special sales
• Champion Blowout Season featuring fan-favorite Seasons plants
• A flowering basket of fixes
Thanks for playing!

Bask in the glorious summer rays of a new PvZ 2 update! It includes:
• Radical new plants, including the oily Olive Pit
• New perks, levels, and rewards in the Darker Ages World for Penny’s Pursuit Mode
• More Season events and prizes
• Elaborate Epic Quests and Pinata parties
• Summer Nights event featuring the return of Strawburst and special sales
• Champion Blowout Season featuring fan-favorite Seasons plants
• A flowering basket of fixes
Thanks for playing!

Summer may be waning, but PvZ 2 is as full and fertile as ever! This update includes:
• Two new plants, the eruptive Explode-O-Vine and the mysterious Murkadamia Nut
• Brand-new zombies in Penny's Pursuit: ZCorp Incorporated Inc.
• New Penny’s Pursuit Perk: Utility Belt
• More Season prizes and events
• New Epic Quests and Piñata Parties
• Some top-notch fixes
Strap in for a wacky summer and crazy fall with Plants vs. Zombies 2!

After the equinox, it's a straight shot into a fertile fall with PvZ 2! This update includes:
• New plant, the generously gelatinous Murkadamia Nut
• New perks and content in Penny's Pursuit, including the Lost City of Doom
• The chilling Lawn of Doom event, Oct. 18 to Nov. 3
• An entirely new Store Design
• More Season Prizes, Epic Quests, and Piñata Parties
• Fixes a-planty

Who loves November? PvZ 2 does! Check out our chill new update, which includes:

• Daily Calendar with daily free stuff
• So many plants: Turkey Pult, Boingsetta, and Headbutter Lettuce
• Our famishing Food Fight event, Nov 16 – 29, with taste-a-licious rewards
• A paradigm-shifting new zombie: ZCorp Consultant
• Virtually endless Penny’s Pursuit levels and prizes
• A powerful new Penny Perk: Boost Tiles

Save your brains this holiday season with PvZ 2!

Celebrate the holidays with PvZ 2! This update includes:
• Uplifting holiday events: Feastivus (Dec 14 – 31) and New Year's sales (Jan 1 – 3)
• New plants, Stickybomb Rice and Hocus Crocus
• Daily Calendar improvements
• Tons o' new Arena and Penny's Pursuit levels
• Fixes to ring out the old and ring in the new
Thanks for playing!

Jump earnestly into a new year with PvZ2! This update includes:

• New Plants: Gloom Vine and Draftodil!
• New Zombie: the hindering HelpDesk!
• Bushels of new Arena and Penny's Pursuit levels!
• Bug fixes and various quality of life improvements!

Jump earnestly into a new year with PvZ2! This update includes:

• New Plants: Gloom Vine and Draftodil!
• New Zombie: the hindering HelpDesk!
• Bushels of new Arena and Penny's Pursuit levels!
• Bug fixes and various quality of life improvements!

April showers bring May powers in PvZ! This update includes:

• New plants: Boom Balloon Flower and Pea Vine!
• Baskets of new Arena and Penny's Pursuit levels!
• New player tutorial improvements!

Spring becomes summer and PvZ2 becomes even more awesome with our newest update, which includes:

• New plant: Inferno!
• The return of Champion Arena Season!
• Jurassic Marsh pervades Penny's Pursuits!
• A more linear experience and curated store offers for new players!
• And oh so many bug fixes!

Spring becomes summer and PvZ2 becomes even more awesome with our newest update, which includes:

• New plant: Inferno!
• The return of Champion Arena Season!
• Jurassic Marsh pervades Penny's Pursuits!
• A more linear experience and curated store offers for new players!
• And oh so many bug fixes!

Plants love summer and so do you! Check out PvZ2's newest update, which includes:

• New plant: Solar Sage!
• Valorous Champion Season!
• The scorching Summer Nights event, with special challenges and rewards!
• Calendar optimizations!
• Streamlined First Time User Experience
• New loading screen art!
• Other tweaks & bug fixes!
